_instructions: 1. Replace YOUR_USERNAME and YOUR_REPOSITORY with your GitHub info
2. Set your server name and current version
3. Save as 'launcher_config.json' in your GitHub repository root
4. The launcher will automatically download from your GitHub releases!
🔧 ADVANCED: You can also use the old format below for backward compatibility
description: Latest game client with awesome new features!
🔄 AUTO-UPDATE LAUNCHER: Enable this for automatic launcher updates
🛡️ PROTECTED FOLDERS: These folders won't be deleted during updates
_legacy_note: The fields below are for backward compatibility with older launchers
⚙️ ADVANCED OPTIONS: You probably don't need to change these
